meanings.definition: An association or combination of companies for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The consortiums of businesses joined forces to improve their bargaining power.
meanings.sent2: The tech consortiums collaborated to develop new software solutions.
meanings.sent3: The consortiums of companies decided to throw a joint party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, consortiums are like powerful alliances in a strategic game.
meanings.sent5: The image of consortiums working together is akin to a symphony orchestra playing in perfect harmony.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals or companies working together on a project.
meanings.sent1: The research consortiums pooled their resources to fund important studies.
meanings.sent2: She joined one of the consortiums to contribute her expertise to the project.
meanings.sent3: The consortiums of volunteers organized a charity event to raise funds.
meanings.sent4: The consortiums building the new bridge faced challenges but overcame them together.
meanings.sent5: The idea of consortiums reminds me of a team of superheroes joining forces to save the day.
